title.EN: How to Use This Online Course

content1.EN:
Course Syllabus

To the left is the course syllabus. You will need to complete each module in order to move to the next. After you have passed the "Practice Quiz" following each module, you may revisit previous course material.

Navigation

The progress bar at the top of each page will show you how far along you are in the current module. Use the left and right arrow buttons to go to the previous and next pages. You may need to scroll down to see additional content on certain pages.

You can log out of the course in the upper right-hand corner. Your place will be saved for the next time you log in.

Please click the RIGHT ARROW to go to the next page.

Teaching Tools

This training course utilizes various teaching tools designed to enhance your learning experience. For example, key vocabulary words throughout the course are set apart in a green bold format. Hover your mouse over the term to see additional information.

[TERM Key Terms (hover over me)] Simply hover over these highlighted words to display the meaning of the term.[/TERM]

Practice Quizzes

These short quizzes are placed at the end of each learning module to test your understanding of the concepts presented. You cannot move to the next module until you have passed the quiz.

Your Certificate

After completing the final exam, you will receive a certificate of completion that can be printed or saved for your records.
